scripts.deploy:back: git add . && npm run git-commit && npm run deploy && npm run git:fso
scripts.git:fso: cd ../ && git add -A && git commit -m "$(read -p 'Commit description: ')" && git push && cd phonebook/
scripts.git-commit: read -p 'Enter commit msg:' MSG && git commit -m "$(read -p 'Commit description: ')"
